name: css-dimension-utilities
description: Css module of single purpose classes for dimension utilities

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-dimension-utilities.css > css/css-dimension-utilities.css && tachyons src/css-dimension-utilities.css --minify > css/css-dimension-utilities.min.css && tachyons src/css-dimension-utilities.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
